files.content:
# Jetbrains IDEs
.idea

_site/
.sass-cache/

company-profiles/.DS_Store

files.name: Dockerfile
files.content:
FROM node:alpine

RUN mkdir node

COPY . ./node

WORKDIR /node/

RUN npm install

CMD npm start
